body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23602](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23602) (wallet: Split stuff from rpcwallet by MarcoFalke)
* [#23502](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23502) (wallet: Avoid underpaying transaction fees when signing taproot spends by achow101)
* [#23413](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23413) (Replace MakeSpan helper with Span deduction guide by sipa)
* [#22929](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22929) (wallet: Automatically add receiving destinations to the address book by S3RK)
* [#22558](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22558) (psbt: Taproot fields for PSBT by achow101)
* [#22514](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22514) (psbt: Actually use SIGHASH_DEFAULT for PSBT signing by achow101)
* [#22513](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22513) (rpc: Allow walletprocesspsbt to sign without finalizing by achow101)
* [#21928](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21928) (wallet: allow toggling external_signer flag by Sjors)
* [#21283](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21283) (Implement BIP 370 PSBTv2 by achow101)
* [#17034](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17034) ([BIP 174] PSBT version, proprietary, and xpub fields by achow101)
* [#16116](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16116) (Avoid unnecessary signing provider copies on descriptor expansion by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
